titles.title: To amend the charter of the Archaeological Institute of America with respect to the principal office of the corporation.
To amend the charter of the Archaeological Institute of America with respect to the principal office of the corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Amends the Act entitled "An Act Incorporating the Archaeological Institute of America" concerning the location of the principal office of the Archaeological Institute of America.
